metadata.name: Shapes of the Ghost Ascension
metadata.description:
Ascension: to leave the cycle of rebirth in a single lifetime and connect with one's Higher Selves in service to all of humanity and the entire planet. 

Have you ever questioned whether there was more to mundane life than meets the eye? Whether there was a proven path to enlightenment, unity, heightened consciousness, higher purpose, or our Higher Self? 

Owning this NFT enables you to open your heart and mind to a new spiritual paradigm that encompasses the most important purpose of your existence. If you choose to be inspired to embody your Higher Self exists right now, experience the positive ripple effect of your Modern Ascension journey.

This NFT is a very special collaboration between the photographer Chazz Gold, Muse, Foxie, and the artist Jeff drawbolt
